p: The total human population growth rate of México was generated using projections of fertility, mortality, and international migration [ 40]. The National Population Council proposed a 30% increase in the population growth rate from 2010 to 2020 in México [ 41]. The Mexican human population from the 2010 census was 112,336,537 inhabitants [ 42]. After obtaining the ENM 2020, human population projections were calculated and the human population at risk of contact with Ae. albopictus was estimated based on two categories: rural population (communities < 10,000 inhabitants) and urban population (communities > 10,000 inhabitants) [ 42].
